data: {"generalSituation":"The intense northeast monsoon now affecting Guangdong will moderate slightly today. With the broad band of clouds covering southern China thinning out, the weather over the region will improve progressively with temperatures rising over the weekend. An easterly airstream is expected to affect the coast of Guangdong early to midweek next week. The area of low pressure near Luzon will move towards the central and southern parts of the South China Sea and dissipate today.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251024","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4 to 5, force 6 offshore at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
